MemberSignature.Value: public void CheckIn (bool SaveChanges = false, ref object Comments, bool MakePublic = false);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CheckIn([in]bool SaveChanges, [in]object& Comments, [in]bool MakePublic) runtime managed
Public Sub CheckIn (Optional SaveChanges As Boolean = false, Optional ByRef Comments As Object, Optional MakePublic As Boolean = false)

param.name: SaveChanges

span.span: Optional Boolean.

param.span: True 将文档保存到服务器位置。

span.span: True saves the document to the server location.
The default is True.

param.name: Comments

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 要签入的文档修订的注释 (仅当等于True时才适用)。

span.span: Comments for the revision of the document being checked in (only applies if equals True).

param.name: MakePublic

span.span: Optional Boolean.

span.b: 允许用户执行签入后进行文档发布。

span.span: True allows the user to perform a publish on the document after being checked in.

param.span: 这将提交文档以供审批过程, 这最终会导致文档的版本被发布给对文档具有只读权限的用户 (仅当等于 True时适用)。

span.span: This submits the document for the approval process, which can eventually result in a version of the document being published to users with read-only rights to the document (only applies if equals True).

summary.span: 该方法将文档从本地计算机返回到服务器，并将本地文档设为只读，使之无法在本地进行编辑。

span.span: Returns a document from a local computer to a server, and sets the local document to read-only so that it cannot be edited locally.

para.span: 要利用 Microsoft Word 中内置的协作功能，文档必须存储在 Microsoft SharePoint Portal Server 上。

span.span: To take advantage of the collaboration features built into Microsoft Word, documents must be stored on a Microsoft SharePoint Portal Server.

summary.span: 将指定对象中的列表编号和 LISTNUM 域更改为文本。

para.span: 有两种类型的数字: 预设号码 (wdNumberParagraph), 您可以通过在 "项目符号和编号" 对话框中选择模板来添加到段落中。和 LISTNUM 域 (wdNumberListNum), 允许您为每个段落添加一个以上的数字。

span.span: There are two types of numbers: preset numbers (wdNumberParagraph), which you can add to paragraphs by selecting a template in the Bullets and Numbering dialog box; and LISTNUM fields (wdNumberListNum), which allow you to add more than one number per paragraph.

para.span: 将列表编号转换为文本后, 不能再在列表中对其进行处理。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Creator As Integer
public: property int Creator { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个 32 位整数，它指示在其中创建指定的对象的应用程序。

span.span: Returns a 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which the specified object was created.

para.span: 如果指定的对象是在 Microsoft Word 中创建的, 则此属性返回十六进制数字是 4d535744, 表示字符串 "MSWD"。

span.span: If the specified object was created in Microsoft Word, this property returns the hexadecimal number 4D535744, which represents the string "MSWD."

para.span: [!注释] 此值还可以通过常量 wdCreatorCode 表示。

span.span: This value can also be represented by the constant wdCreatorCode.

para.span: Creator属性主要用于在 Macintosh 上使用, 其中每个应用程序都有一个四字符创建者代码。

span.span: The Creator property was primarily designed to be used on the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code.

para.span: 例如，Microsoft Word 提供了 MSWD 的创建者代码。

span.span: For example, Microsoft Word has the creator code MSWD.

para.span: 有关此属性的其他信息，请参阅语言参考 Microsoft Office Macintosh 版本所附带的帮助。

span.span: For additional information about this property, consult the language reference Help included with Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition.

summary.span: 返回 Word 为文档中的更改所分配的随机数。

span.span: Returns a random number that Word assigns to changes in a document.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

para.span: 如果该属性为True, 则每次保存文档时, Word 都会生成一个随机编号, 应用程序使用该随机数来促进和合并文档。

span.span: If the property is True, each time a document is saved, Word generates a random number that the application uses to facilitate comparing and merging documents.

para.span: Word 将随机数字存储在表中，并在每次保存后更新该表格。

span.span: Word stores the random numbers in a table and updates the table after each save.

para.span: 该属性返回 Word 已分配给文档的最后一个编号。

span.span: The property returns the last number that Word has assigned to a document.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DetectLanguage() runtime managed

summary.span: 分析指定文本，以确定书写文本的语言类型。

span.span: Analyzes the specified text to determine the language that it is written in.

para.span: DetectLanguage 方法的结果存储在基于字符的字符的 语言标识 属性。

span.span: The results of the DetectLanguage method are stored in the LanguageID property on a character-by-character basis.

para.span: 若要读取 语言标识 属性，必须首先指定所选内容或范围内的文本。

span.span: To read the LanguageID property, you must first specify a selection or range of text.

para.span: DetectLanguage方法检查文档中的所有可用文本 (页眉、页脚、文本框等)。

span.span: The DetectLanguage method checks all available text in the document (headers, footers, text boxes, and so forth).

para.span: 如果指定的文本包含了某个句子的一部分，所选内容或范围扩展到句子的末尾。

span.span: If the specified text contains a partial sentence, the selection or range is extended to the end of the sentence.

para.span: 如果DetectLanguage方法已应用于指定的文本, 该属性将设置为True。

span.span: If the DetectLanguage method has already been applied to the specified text, the property is set to True.

para.span: 若要重新计算指定文本的语言, 必须首先将LanguageDetected属性设置为False。

span.span: To re-evaluate the language of the specified text, you must first set the LanguageDetected property to False.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DisableFeatures { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 确定是否禁用了在属性中指定的版本之后引入的所有功能。

span.span: Determines if all features introduced after the version specified in the property are disabled.

para.span: 如果在DisableFeaturesIntroducedAfter属性中指定的版本之后引入的所有功能都被禁用, 则此属性返回True , 如果启用这些功能, 则返回False 。

span.span: This property returns True if all features introduced after the version specified in the DisableFeaturesIntroducedAfter property are disabled, and False if they are enabled.

para.span: DisableFeatures 属性只影响您设置该属性的文档。

span.span: The DisableFeatures property only affects the document for which you set the property.

para.span: 如果您计划在使用早期版本的 Microsoft Word 的用户之间共享文档, 则不会最终引入文档功能, 这些功能在 Word 版本中不可用。

span.span: Use this property if you plan on sharing a document between users with earlier versions of Microsoft Word, so you don't end up introducing into a document features that are not available in their versions of Word.

para.span: 使用属性在指定版本之后引入的所有文档功能中禁用。

span.span: Use the property to disable in all documents features introduced after a specified version.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdDisableFeaturesIntroducedAfter DisableFeaturesIntroducedAfter { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdDisableFeaturesIntroducedAfter get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdDisableFeaturesIntroducedAfter value); };

summary.span: 禁用的 Microsoft Word 仅在文档中指定的版本之后引入的所有功能。

span.span: Disables all features introduced after a specified version of Microsoft Word in the document only.

para.span: 在设置DisableFeaturesIntroducedAfter属性之前, 必须将该属性设置为True 。

span.span: The property must be set to True prior to setting the DisableFeaturesIntroducedAfter property.

para.span: 否则为设置才会生效，并且将保持 Word 97 的用于 Windows 的默认设置。

span.span: Otherwise, the setting will not take effect and will remain at its default setting of Word 97 for Windows.

para.span: DisableFeaturesIntroducedAfter 属性只影响为其设置属性的文档。

span.span: The DisableFeaturesIntroducedAfter property only affects the document for which the property is set.

para.span: 如果要为应用程序设置全局选项以禁用所有文档的功能, 请使用属性。

span.span: If you want to set a global option for the application to disable features for all documents, use the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DoNotEmbedSystemFonts { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 确定 Microsoft Word 是否嵌入常用系统字体。

span.span: Determines if Microsoft Word embeds common system fonts.

para.span: 如果 Microsoft Word 不嵌入普通系统字体, 则此属性返回True , 如果 word 嵌入系统字体, 则返回False 。

span.span: This property returns True if Microsoft Word does not embed common system fonts, and False if Word embeds system fonts.

para.span: 将此属性设置为True或False可启用或禁用功能。

span.span: Set this property to True or False to enable or disable the functionality.

para.span: 如果用户在东亚系统上, 并且想要创建的文档在其系统上没有该语言的字体, 则将DoNotEmbedSystemFonts属性设置为False将非常有用。

span.span: Setting the DoNotEmbedSystemFonts property to False is useful if the user is on an East Asian system and wants to create a document that is readable by others who do not have fonts for that language on their system.

para.span: 例如，日语系统上的用户可以选择在文档中嵌入字体，以便日语文档中可读的所有系统上。

span.span: For example, a user on a Japanese system could choose to embed the fonts in a document so that the Japanese document would be readable on all systems.

span.span: This property returns True if Microsoft Word saves the smart tag information in a document.

para.span: 将文档发送给在其计算机上可能没有智能标记识别器文件的用户时, 请使用EmbedSmartTags属性。

span.span: Use the EmbedSmartTags property when sending documents to users who may not have the smart tag recognizer file on their computer.

para.span: 这样, 收件人仍可以访问智能标记信息 (如果他们的计算机上有智能标记操作文件, 还可以访问相关的操作)。

span.span: This allows the recipient to still have access to the smart tag information (and to the related actions if they have the smart tag actions file on their computer).

para.span: 但是, 如果包含智能标记的文档由具有早期版本的 Word 的用户编辑, 智能标记信息将被删除。

span.span: However, if a document containing smart tags is edited by a user with an earlier version of Word, the smart tag information is removed.

param.name: OutputFileName
param.span: 新的 PDF 或 XPS 文件的路径和文件名。

span.span: The path and file name name of the new PDF or XPS file.

param.name: ExportFormat
param.span: 指定采用 PDF 格式或 XPS 格式。

span.span: Specifies either PDF or XPS format.

param.name: OpenAfterExport
param.span: 导出内容后打开新文件。

span.span: Opens the new file after exporting the contents.

param.name: OptimizeFor
param.span: 指定是针对屏幕显示还是打印进行优化。

span.span: Specifies whether to optimize for screen or print.

param.name: Range
param.span: 指定导出区域是整个文档、当前页面、文本区域还是当前所选内容。默认情况下导出整个文档。

span.span: Specifies whether the export range is the entire document, the current page, a range of text, or the current selection. the default is to export the entire document.

param.name: From
param.span: 如果将参数设置为, 则指定起始页码。

span.span: Specifies the starting page number, if the parameter is set to .

param.name: To
param.span: 如果将参数设置为, 则指定结束页码。

span.span: Specifies the ending page number, if the parameter is set to .

param.name: Item
param.span: 指定导出过程是只包括文本还是包括文本和标记。

span.span: Specifies whether the export process includes text only or includes text with markup.

param.name: IncludeDocProps
param.span: 指定在最新导出的文件中是否包括文档属性。

span.span: Specifies whether to include document properties in the newly exported file.

param.name: KeepIRM
param.span: 指定是否将 IRM 权限复制到 XPS 文档，如果在源文档具有 IRM 保护。

span.span: Specifies whether to copy IRM permissions to an XPS document if the source document has IRM protections.
Default value is True.

param.name: CreateBookmarks
param.span: 指定是否导出书签和要导出的书签的类型。

span.span: Specifies whether to export bookmarks and the type of bookmarks to export.

param.name: DocStructureTags
param.span: 指定是否包含额外数据来帮助屏幕阅读器，例如有关的流和逻辑组织的内容的信息。

span.span: Specifies whether to include extra data to help screen readers, for example information about the flow and logical organization of the content.
Default value is True.

param.name: BitmapMissingFonts
param.span: 指定是否包含文本的位图。

span.span: Specifies whether to include a bitmap of the text.

param.span: 当字体许可不允许在 PDF 文件中嵌入某一字体时，请将此参数设置为 True 。

span.span: Set this parameter to True when font licenses do not permit a font to be embedded in the PDF file.

param.span: 如果 False ，则引用该字体，和查看者的计算机会替换合适的字体，如果编写的一个不可用。

span.span: If False, the font is referenced, and the viewer's computer substitutes an appropriate font if the authored one is not available.
Default value is True.

param.name: UseISO19005_1
param.span: 指定是否限制对 PDF 子集的 PDF 使用按照 ISO 标准化 19005-1。

span.span: Specifies whether to limit PDF usage to the PDF subset standardized as ISO 19005-1.

param.span: 如果 真 ，所产生的文件会更加可靠地自我包含，但可能会更大或显示更多的视觉瑕疵，由于受到格式的限制。

span.span: If True, the resulting files are more reliably self-contained but may be larger or show more visual artifacts due to the restrictions of the format.
Default value is False.

param.name: FixedFormatExtClassPtr
param.span: 指定一个指针以指向一个允许对代码的备用实现进行调用的加载项。代码的备用实现将对应用程序生成的 EMF 和 EMF+ 页面描述进行解释，以生成其自身的 PDF 或 XPS。有关详细信息，请参阅 MSDN 上的"扩展 Office (2007) 固定格式导出功能"。

span.span: Specifies a pointer to an add-in that allows calls to an alternate implementation of code. The alternate implementation of code interprets the EMF and EMF+ page descriptions that are generated by the applications to make their own PDF or XPS. For more information, see "Extending the Office (2007) Fixed-Format Export Feature" on MSDN.

summary.span: 将文档保存为 PDF 或 XPS 格式。

span.span: Saves a document as PDF or XPS format.

para.span: 只有在安装加载项之后，才能从 2007 Microsoft Office system 程序中另存为 PDF 或 XPS 文件。有关详细信息，请在 Office Online 上搜索“启用对其他文件格式（如 PDF 和 XPS）的支持”。

span.span: You can save as a PDF or XPS file from a 2007 Microsoft Office system program only after you install an add-in. For more information, search for "Enable support for other file formats, such as PDF and XPS" on Office Online.

para.span: 如果在一个文档中使用的 TrueType 字体少于 32 个字符，则 Word 将在文档中嵌入 TrueType 字体子集（只包含所用的字体）；如果使用的 TrueType 字体多于 32 个字符，则 Word 在文档中嵌入整个 TrueType 字体。

span.span: If fewer than 32 characters of a TrueType font are used in a document, Word embeds the subset (only the characters used) in the document. If more than 32 characters are used, Word embeds the entire font.

Public Sub TransformDocument (Path As String, Optional DataOnly As Boolean = false)

span.span: Required String.
The path for the XSLT to use.

param.name: DataOnly

span.span: Optional Boolean.

param.span: True 转换仅适用于在文档中的数据不包括 Microsoft Word XML。

span.span: True applies the transformation only to the data in the document, excluding Microsoft Word XML.

param.span: 假 到整个文档，包括 Word XML 应用的转换。

span.span: False applies the transform to the entire document, including Word XML.
Default value is True.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Unprotect([in]object& Password) runtime managed
Public Sub Unprotect (Optional ByRef Password As Object)

param.name: Password

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 用于保护文档的密码字符串。

span.span: The password string used to protect the document.
Passwords are case-sensitive.

param.span: 如果用户在使用一篇设置有密码的文档时没有提供正确的密码，就会显示一个对话框，提示用户输入密码。

span.span: If the document is protected with a password and the correct password isn't supplied, a dialog box prompts the user for the password.

summary.span: 从指定的文档中删除保护。

span.span: Removes protection from the specified document.

summary.span: 如果对文档没有加以保护，则该方法会导致出错。

span.span: If the document isn't protected, this method generates an error.

para.span: 避免在应用程序中使用硬编码的密码。如果某个过程需要密码，可要求用户提供密码，将其以变量形式进行存储，然后在编码中使用该变量。

span.span: Avoid using hard-coded passwords in your applications. If a password is required in a procedure, request the password from the user, store it in a variable, and then use the variable in your code.

summary.span: 返回或设置一个 boolean 类型的值 ，该值代表是否从内置的 Word 错误消息或 Office 附带的 Microsoft XML Core Services (MSXML) (MSXML) 5.0 组件生成错误消息文本。

para.span: 使用 MSXML 5.0 组件的高级的错误信息可提供更具体的错误信息。 有大约 500 个错误消息通过 XMLShowAdvancedErrors 属性为 True 时也能访问 XML 核心服务提供的。

para.span: Word 大约有 50 内置的常规架构错误。 当 XMLShowAdvancedErrors 属性为 False 时，Word 将使用内置错误消息的 XML 文档中生成的错误。

span.span: Word has approximately 50 built-in generic schema errors. When the XMLShowAdvancedErrors property is False, Word uses the built-in error messages for errors generated in XML documents.
